channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report E-2023100423
item.description:
Report E-2023100423

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-16T18:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report E-2023100304
item.description:
Report E-2023100304

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-14T00:31:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: ABBOTSFORD
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While parked at a Kwik Trip truck stop, the Veolia driver noticed liquid dripping out of the trailer. Upon investigation, he found a leaking drum with a puncture near the bottom of the container. An overpack was placed underneath the leak to contain as much of the spill as possible until the remediation crew arrived. Approximately 20 gallons of liquid leaked out of the drum. Kwik Trip contacted and emergency response company to assist with clean-up.
